meanings.definition: Used by us or for us.
meanings.sent1: We made the decision by ourselves.
meanings.sent2: We need to take care of ourselves.
meanings.sent3: We accidentally locked ourselves out of the house.
meanings.sent4: We found ourselves lost in the unfamiliar city.
meanings.sent5: We must rely on ourselves to succeed.

meanings.sent1: We should be proud of ourselves.
meanings.sent2: We can trust ourselves to do the right thing.
meanings.sent3: We surprised ourselves with how well we did on the test.
meanings.sent4: We sometimes need to push ourselves out of our comfort zones.
meanings.sent5: We know ourselves better than anyone else.
